cleancall 0.1.3.9000

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

cleancall (development version)

cleancall 0.1.3

CRAN release: 2022-10-26

  • No user visible changes.

cleancall 0.1.2

CRAN release: 2022-03-10

  • Fix ABI compatibility for pre and post R 4.0.1 versions. Now CRAN builds (with R 4.0.2 and later 4.0.x) work well on R 4.0.0.

  • cleancall now better supports embedding it into another R package, see the ‘Embedding cleancall’ section in the README for details.

cleancall 0.1.1

CRAN release: 2020-01-11

  • Fix compilation errors with -fno-common.

cleancall 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2019-05-20

First public release
